SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AttachingCodec<R>
Codec for attaching a value and passing it as context to the wrapped codec.
AttachingMapCodec<R>
MapCodec for attaching a value and passing it
AttachingStreamCodec<B,V>
A StreamCodec for attaching a value and passing it as context to the wrapped codec.
AttachmentDispatchCodec<A,R>
A Codec that retrieves an attachment and determines which codec to use based on that attachment.
AttachmentDispatchMapCodec<A,R>
A MapCodec that retrieves an attachment and determines which codec to use based on that attachment.
AttachmentDispatchStreamCodec<A,B,V>
A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment and determines which codec to use based on that attachment.
AttachmentKey<A>
A typed key allowing things to be attached to a DynamicOps or FriendlyByteBuf.
AttachmentManager
Manages AttachmentKeys.
ChildBufferFactory<B1,B2>
Creates a buffer that inherits metadata (like RegistryAccess) from a parent buffer.
CodecOrUnit<A>
Type that maybe holds a codec or maybe holds a supplier.
CodecOrUnit.Unit<A>
Unit type, encodes nothing, returns supplied value.
CodecOrUnit.Wrapper<A>
Wrapper type, contains a codec.
Codextra
Codextra DFU codec utility root class.
CodextraStreams
Codextra Stream codec utility root class.
ErrorHandlingMapCodec<R>
Like OptionalFieldCodec but with an extra error-handling consumer.
FunctionUtils
Utilities for working with java functional programming.
IfPresentCodec<R>
A Codec that delegates to one codec if an attachment is present and another if the attachment is absent.
IfPresentDispatchCodec<A,R>
A Codec that retrieves an attachment if present and uses it to determine which codec to use or uses another codec if the attachment is absent.
IfPresentDispatchMapCodec<A,R>
A MapCodec that retrieves an attachment if present and uses it to determine which codec to use or uses another codec if the attachment is absent.
IfPresentDispatchStreamCodec<A,B,V>
A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment if present and uses it to determine which codec to use or uses another codec if the attachment is absent.
IfPresentMapCodec<R>
A MapCodec that delegates to one codec if an attachment is present and another if the attachment is absent.
IfPresentStreamCodec<B,V>
A StreamCodec that delegates to one codec if an attachment is present and another if the attachment is absent.
KeyAttachingCodec<K,R>
A MapCodec that decodes one value and uses it to create attachments to attach to the context when decoding the other value.
KeyCheckingMapCodec<O>
Map codec that requires a given set of keys in order to even consider decoding.
MapKeyDispatchCodec<K,V>
Version of KeyDispatchCodec that takes a MapCodec as its key.
MutKeyAttachingCodec<K,R>
A MapCodec that decodes one value and uses it to create the attachments to attach to the context when decoding the other value, but that also allows mutation of the attachment while encoding, making sure those changes show up in the decoded key.
MutReadAttachingStreamCodec<B1,B2,K,V>
A StreamCodec that decodes one value and uses it create attachments to attach to the context when decoding the result value, but that also allows mutation of the attachment while encoding, making sure those changes show up in the decoded key.
OpsReplacingRecordBuilder<T>
RecordBuilder that delegates to another record builder but that replaces the ops.
ReadAttachingStreamCodec<B,K,V>
A StreamCodec that decodes one value and uses it to create attachments to attach to the context when decoding the result value.
RetrievalMapCodec<A,R>
MapCodec for retrieving an attachment.
RetrievalStreamCodec<A,B,V>
A StreamCodec that retrieves an attachment from the decoding context.
RetrieveWithCodec<A,O,R>
A Codec that decodes a value and combines it with an attachment to create the result.
RetrieveWithMapCodec<A,O,R>
A MapCodec that decodes a value and combines it with an attachment to create a result.
RetrieveWithStreamCodec<A,B,O,R>
A StreamCodec that decodes a value and combines it with an attachment to create a result.
